Datasets in zenodo have the same filename, but a different path. Change path in the relevent code to the location you download the datasets to.
Fig 4

/gws/nopw/j04/campus/pseudoDropBox/PISCES/AMM75/LONGRUN/PROCESSED/section_time_mean_cross-shelf_u_1996-2015.nc
